title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: Become Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter who traverses a dazzling yet dangerous fantasy world. The tasks you undertake influence the fate of entire lands and decide the destinies of many characters. It's an epic journey, full of combat, intrigue, and magic.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
description: Explore life in the Wild West during the decline of outlaw culture. Step into the shoes of Arthur Morgan, a member of the Van der Linde gang, and uncover dark secrets and intricate plots in a detailed open-world. The game offers many possibilities, from hunting animals to robbing trains.

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: A sequel to the game acclaimed for its storytelling depth and emotional experience. Players take on the role of Ellie, who traverses a post-apocalyptic world infected by a virus in search of justice and revenge. The game tackles difficult moral and emotional themes while offering an extraordinary story and incredible gameplay.
